text:
An aircraft is a go &1specialcases that is able to fly by gaining support from the air. Go &2home .It counters the force of gravity by 
using either static lift or the dynamic lift of an airfoil,[1] or, in a few cases, direct downward thrust from its 
engines. &3Common examples of aircraft include airplanes, helicopters, airships (including blimps), gliders, 
paramotors, and hot air balloons.
